channel.title: How can i read data from integrated sensor
channel.description: Hello, i would like to know how to read from my yellow board the data of the integrated sensor (for example the geolocation data or the humidity data). How can i do it?

item.title: How can i read data from integrated sensor
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
is this app connected to datahub.io?

github.com

//github.com/legatoproject/legato-af/tree/master/apps/sample/mqtt

How about this MQTT app?

Sending file over mqtt using mqttClient-for-Legato
hi i am using mqttClient-for-Legato. I am able to publish data. But i am not able to send file using “mqtt pubfile topic filename” It says cannot open file and I have already given all the permissions. Any help would be appreciated Zehra

How about using the Mosquitto_pub and Mosquitto_sub client utilities?

| – 12 May 17

Using The Mosquitto_pub and Mosquitto_sub MQTT Client Tools- Examples

Using The Mosquitto_pub and mosquiito_sub Client Tools that come with the Mosquitto broker install package for testing and troubleshooting with Examples

item.source: How can i read data from integrated sensor

item.title: How can i read data from integrated sensor
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
which FW are you using for WP7608?
FW R16.1?
If yes, you can download the yocto source here:

https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/wp76xx/wp76xx-firmware-release-16,-d-,1-components/#sthash.F2uJ6ii0.dpbs

Just extract it and type “make” to build the yocto image.

Read full topic

item.source: How can i read data from integrated sensor

item.title: How can i read data from integrated sensor
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
you can refer to imu.c, in line 160, it uses
*readingPtr = (*readingPtr + offset) * scaling / 1000;

github.com

mangOH/mangOH/blob/master/apps/YellowSensor/components/sensors/imu/imu.c

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/**
 * Implementation of the mangOH Red Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensor interface.
 *
 * Provides the accelerometer and gyro IPC API services and plugs into the Legato Data Hub.
 *
 * Copyright (C) Sierra Wireless Inc.
 */
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#include "legato.h"
#include "interfaces.h"

#include "imu.h"
#include "fileUtils.h"
#include "periodicSensor.h"

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/**
 * Read the accelerometer's linear acceleration measurement in meters per second squared.
This file has been truncated. show original

t
11776

item.source: How can i read data from integrated sensor

item.title: How can i read data from integrated sensor
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
You can try this after loading the mangoh software:

github.com

mangOH/mangOH/blob/master/apps/YellowSensor/components/sensors/imu/Component.cdef

//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
/**
 * Component definition file for the mangOH Red Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU)
 * sensor interface component.
 */
//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
cflags:
{
    -std=c99
}

provides:
{
    api:
    {
        $CURDIR/../../../interfaces/imu.api
        $CURDIR/../../../interfaces/temperature.api
    }
}
This file has been truncated. show original

Read full topic
